about_the_game:
Shola sports khaki shorts and sandy accoutrements inspired by various British divisions, including the Desert Rats, famous for their role in the North African Campaign. It might seem like a recipe for a grazed knee but the shorts and rolled sleeves are perfect for the hellish climate…
This pack includes:
- Desert Rat Shola Outfit
- 3 Hats for Shola (Desert Rat Cap, Desert Rat Beanie + Desert Rat Scarf)
detailed_description:
Shola sports khaki shorts and sandy accoutrements inspired by various British divisions, including the Desert Rats, famous for their role in the North African Campaign. It might seem like a recipe for a grazed knee but the shorts and rolled sleeves are perfect for the hellish climate…
This pack includes:
- Desert Rat Shola Outfit
- 3 Hats for Shola (Desert Rat Cap, Desert Rat Beanie + Desert Rat Scarf)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.

short_description: Shola sports khaki shorts and sandy accoutrements inspired by various British divisions, including the Desert Rats, famous for their role in the North African Campaign.
